meanings.definition: Impressive or magnificent in appearance or style.
meanings.sent1: The grandiose castle stood tall against the blue sky.
meanings.sent2: The grandiose chandelier sparkled in the ballroom.
meanings.sent3: The grandiose cake towered over the other desserts at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her grandiose dreams reached for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The grandiose mountain peak took our breath away.

meanings.sent1: The grandiose celebration was filled with music and laughter.
meanings.sent2: The grandiose mansion had a pool and a tennis court.
meanings.sent3: His grandiose plans for the weekend involved a yacht and a private island.
meanings.sent4: The grandiose fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The grandiose ballroom was adorned with crystal chandeliers.

meanings.sent1: His grandiose speech was filled with empty promises.
meanings.sent2: The grandiose businessman always talked about his wealth.
meanings.sent3: The grandiose outfit he wore made him look like a clown.
meanings.sent4: Her grandiose attitude turned people away.
meanings.sent5: The grandiose title he gave himself was laughable.
